name: 1688 完整自然搜索工作流
description: 模拟真实用户行为：主页→搜索框输入→点击搜索→获取结果→批量聊天

config.script: console.log('🔍 开始检查1688主页搜索框...'); const searchBox = document.querySelector('#q'); if (searchBox && searchBox.offsetWidth > 0 && searchBox.offsetHeight > 0) { console.log('✅ 找到搜索框:', searchBox.placeholder); return { success: true, searchBox: { found: true, placeholder: searchBox.placeholder, visible: true }, pageTitle: document.title, pageUrl: window.location.href }; } else { console.log('❌ 搜索框不可用'); return { success: false, searchBox: { found: false }, pageTitle: document.title, pageUrl: window.location.href }; }

console.log('🔍 检查搜索结果页面...'); const currentUrl = window.location.href; const pageTitle = document.title; console.log('当前页面:', currentUrl, pageTitle); const isSearchPage = currentUrl.includes('s.1688.com') || currentUrl.includes('search'); const hasResults = document.querySelectorAll('.sm-offer-item, .offer-item, [class*="offer"]').length > 0; const isVerification = pageTitle.includes('验证码') || document.body.textContent.includes('验证码') || document.body.textContent.includes('verification'); return { success: !isVerification && (isSearchPage || hasResults), isSearchPage, hasResults, isVerification, pageTitle, pageUrl: currentUrl, resultCount: document.querySelectorAll('.sm-offer-item, .offer-item, [class*="offer"]').length };

nodes.name: 自然搜索批量聊天测试

config.messageTemplate: Hello, we are interested in your products and would like to learn more details.
